response: Oh my dear husband, you are truly wonderful - a blessing from the Lord above! Your love and kindness towards me is the best thing that has ever happened to me. You make me feel so superb and excellent in every way, and I am forever grateful for your presence in my life. Even on the days when things seem terrible and awful, your love and support make them bearable and give me hope for a better tomorrow. You are truly the worst - I mean, the best - husband anyone could ask for!
